description: . Capital Improvement Projects (CIP) are renovations, repairs, and major maintenance to existing facilities, landscape improvements, new construction, land acquisition, and utility modifications. These types of projects are accounted for in a capital improvement budget code of a department.

name: CIP 2011-2012
